website_summaries.verdict: The Continental 80 is among the famous Adidas Originals silhouettes. Fans love it for its timeless design, superb comfort, and ever-friendly price point. So Adidas once again reimagines the silhouette, this time modeling it after ’80s fitness styles and old-school skate shoes.A clean, vintage-inspired sneaker, the Continental Vulc carries on a long, rich heritage. The familiar-looking Continental 80 silhouette now comprises of embroidered canvas with suede overlays, which settles atop a vulcanized sole unit. Exuding lots of crisp and style without missing on comfort, the Continental Vulc sits at a mind-blowing $65 price tag.
pros: Nearly a hundred reviewers have given the Adidas Continental Vulc five-star ratings and highly recommended this “show-stopper” of a shoe
The majority of testers find it to be extremely comfortable despite not being a Boost model
It is budget-friendly, and almost all shoppers express that it has the most value one can get for the price
Quality-wise, it has exceeded the expectations of most buyers as it is made with premium materials and astounding attention to detail
Its neat, old-school silhouette has the right amount of pop and stands out without overpowering one’s outfit, according to many reviewers
It is easy to style and matches any types of pants, a handful of users have mentioned
This sneaker is available in over a dozen colorways, which is a delight to shoppers and collectors
Heaps of customers are flabbergasted with its AriZona Iced Tea-themed colorways, which feature finely embroidered colored prints and impressively detailed insoles
Many wearers are convinced that it looks better in person as they've heard loads of compliments from onlookers whenever they're walking on them
It is a nice, solid pair to wear on a daily basis, according to most users
cons: Several users find the sneaker a little clunky

customer_reviews.title: To small, even after ordering bigger size, hard to break in.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these so much, I'm normally a 10/10,5, so I decided to get the 10,5 to be safe, but when I got them they were to small, so I reordered the 11 men's size, and they fit better, after a week of trying to break them in i have decided to throw my hands in the air and give up, been in so much leg and feet pain its just not worth it. Maybe its just my feet, but I now am $45 poorer, and with shoo3s I can't return or use, anyway they nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Mr groger

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a 6 1/2, but they were a 1/2 size too big. I wear an 8 in ladies. I returned them for a size 6 and they fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Ka$h

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful old school look, with modern comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These feel like a direct extension of my foot. Makes me feel sure footed with a solid feel. Old school look that awesome back and white and come with both white and black laces
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker proves you don't have to spend a fortune in order to get a great shoe. Very comfortable and trendy, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Rapaport

customer_reviews.title: Wearing them right now
customer_reviews.text: Solid built shoes, good for skating will survive a good thrashing. Comfortable as all day work kicks
customer_reviews.author: Harold Torres

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level is much less than other previous Adidas purchases
customer_reviews.text: Good look and stylish. Unfortunately the comfort level is below par for me. The footbed is too rigid and does not allow the shoe to flex with each step.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a classic Adidas fan, so I did not hesitate when I saw this shoe. Simple, but stylish.
customer_reviews.author: LHUDCA

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Came perfect, quickly, no damages, they’re so comfortable, and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for the price hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good,feels good (kinda like vans) and you really can't beat the price. I'm ordering 2 more pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and timely shipping
customer_reviews.text: Was part of an Amazon Wardrobe order. Fit was perfect and love the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: aneeseus

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been perfect. They are stylish and go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my daughter. She loves the simple style & the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Megaw

customer_reviews.title: You should buy
customer_reviews.text: Very slick and good looking shoes, fits just right and looks clean with outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: My son loved them so much.
customer_reviews.text: my son loved them so much I brought my daughter a pair and now I want some too.
customer_reviews.author: Arkeesha galloway

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for its size. Not comfortable. Please don go for it.
customer_reviews.author: DURGESH RANJAN

customer_reviews.title: These don't make you look like a dad
customer_reviews.text: These Shoes are amazing love the grown man look without the dad shoe vibe...
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Harris Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect . Came with the shoe box . Perfect order
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Almasan

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: i like how product fits and is how it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Love it

customer_reviews.title: 13 BUCKS?!
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn up but still had tags and NO scuffs or dirty soles. The midnight blue is really cool ( I thought they were black in the listing, so BONUS.) Can't beat that price.
customer_reviews.author: Jayceem

customer_reviews.title: Love but sizing is eh
customer_reviews.text: Although these shoes are very stylish it took me forever just to figure out the shoes size. I knew that they would run big since they’re men’s and I’m a girl but it was extremely big. I usually wear a size 8 W and I ordered a 6.5 M and it finally fit.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Palomo

customer_reviews.title: Legend ink isn’t black, it’s a very dark blue.
customer_reviews.text: The color is legend ink; which is NOT BLACK. they appear black online but when you brighten the photo and increase the vibrancy you can see that they are a deep dark blue. That is why some people may be confused when they receive “blue” instead of black. It’s just the legend ink color.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Continental Vulc Shoes Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Continental 80 shoes capture vintage nostalgia modelled after the retro look of '80s fitness styles. These low top trainers feature a canvas upper with nubuck details and a vulcanised rubber outsole for a skate-inspired look and feel.
